title: Exports increased by 25% in 9 months of current FY: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 1 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib Friday said the county’s exports remained $23.332 billion during the first nine months of the current fiscal year, posting a growth of 25 per cent which was unprecedented.
In a tweet he said, exports during the same period of the last fiscal year were $18.688 billion.
پاکستان کی تاریخ میں پہلی مرتبہ رواں مالی سال کے 9 ماہ میں برآمدات کا حجم 25٪اضافے کے ساتھ 23.332ارب ڈالر تک پہنچ گیا۔ گزشتہ مالی سال کی اس مدت میں 18.688ارب ڈالر کی برآمدات تھیں۔ صرف مارچ کے مہینے میں 2.773ارب ڈالر کی برآمدات ہوئیں۔ pic.twitter.com/ns3f9Ocz2B
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) April 1, 2022
The minister said that exports during March alone stood at $2.773 billion.
